label: 7 Train
narrative: There's a popular idea that the neighborhoods served by the 7 train are among the most diverse in the city. Queens' language diversity isn't just confined to those areas, though.

label: Beyond English and Spanish
narrative: Which neighborhoods have the highest concentrations of people who speak languages other than English and Spanish, as reported by the Census?

label: New New Yorkers
narrative: Where are the highest percentages of people born outside of the United States?
